subject: Fuel Efficiency
Automobile Racing
Le Mans Auto Race
Automobiles
lead_paragraph: On Saturday, the 24 Hours of Le Mans is running its 82nd edition with historic new regulations that are even bolder than the new Formula One rules.
snippet: On Saturday, the 24 Hours of Le Mans is running its 82nd edition with historic new regulations that are even bolder than the new Formula One rules.
